attributes.action: allow people of the uk to use medicinal Cannabis for muscle spasms and pain relief.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we believe the population of the United Kingdom should be allowed the right to use medicinal Cannabis for muscle spasms and pain relief.

 They should be able to use medicinal Cannabis without fear of prosecution. 

I only agree to the above terms if the medicinal Cannabis user has a medical professional’s support/ backing, stating that they have a genuine medical condition where cannabis alleviates their symptoms and improves their daily lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
